issue.title: [C++][Plasma] Fix inconsistent comment style
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8030](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8030). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The comments in the plasma are a mixture of '@params' and '\params'. The reviewers required me to unify the style when I was trying to add windows support. I think it would be better to address it using a different PR.
